```{r}
library(tidyverse)

salmon <- read_csv("salmon_imports.csv")
```

```{r}
# Scatter plot
salmon_plot <- ggplot(salmon, aes(x = Year, y = salmon_fresh)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Salmon Imports", title="Juan's Graph")

salmon_plot
```
